ConsoleClear.summary: The console.clear() static method clears the console if the console allows it. A graphical console, like those running on browsers, will allow it; a console displaying on the terminal, like the one running on Node, will not support it, and will have no effect (and no error).

remarks.para:
-Microsoft Edge's documentation for console.clear()
-Node.JS documentation for console.clear()
-Google Chrome's documentation for console.clear()
